name: Tiki Man
description: Chop the world's tallest Tiki! 4 tropical environments and 16 Tiki Men to unlock!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8 Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 128 MB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 60 MB available space

reviews.review_text: A cheap lazy cash in. The game can be summed up in that trailer. That's all there is
It's ok but monotinous. Props to the developers.

Hello.  I am Tiki Man. For many year I chop down the Great Tiki. It is duty to chop down Tiki. It is calling to chop down Great Tiki.  Many say no! shh! it is legend! Great Tiki is god, Great Tiki never end, Great Tiki cannot be chop down.  Them, I say, no! I will chop down Great Tiki. I wil become Great Tiki man. I will become Tiki legend.  every chop you help me bring down Great Tiki. many year Great Tiki take from land. Great Tiki must be stop. help Tiki man become Tiki legend. Tiki man will answer any Tiki questions about Tiki lifestyle.  Think you can Tiki?™
Holy Tiki Tower, Batman! This game is super fun and highly addicting. It's a great game to play while you wait for a que in WoW or a match in LoL or anything like that.  Get this ♥♥♥♥!
